Room.Name: Ashton River Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Ashton River Road, just east of the Foothills Trail.
Room.LongDescription: The road is rather steep to the east, but has a downward slope going to the west. The Ashton River looks like it calms down further west, but is pretty wild coming from the foothills. It looks like fishermen have made a nice little camp under the trees by the river bank.
